channel.title: How to add custom player stats?
channel.description:
Server: Rune-Evo Clinet: Matrix 718
For instance I want to add a point system for pvp kills (possibly later implement boss kills but for now stick to pvp) and eventually a reward system. But i want to stick to the basics right now.
I'm using eclipse and in com.rs.game.player.content.custom I have a class file called PvpPoints.
How would I go about saving individual stats for each person and then upon killing another player increment said points. I don't see any classes for player combat.
P.S. I know Java, I just don't know where the classes are that handles combat / how to add custom points to the server.
EDIT: I assume I have to add the points as a private variable in the player class and have a getter and setter for it (which I have done) for starters.
